POS.ANCHORED_HELP: Stays in place relative to center marker.
POS.STATIC_HELP: Not part of any set. Does not recenter.

APP_SETTINGS.BLOCK_GAME_INPUT_HELP: Blocks all input when an overlay is hovered
APP_SETTINGS.BLOCK_GAME_INPUT_IGNORE_WATCH_HELP: Do not block input when watch is hovered
APP_SETTINGS.BLOCK_POSES_ON_KBD_INTERACTION: Block poses when interacting with keyboard
APP_SETTINGS.BLOCK_POSES_ON_KBD_INTERACTION_HELP: Blocks the game from receiving poses when the keyboard is hovered and 'Block game input' is enabled
APP_SETTINGS.CAPTURE_METHOD_HELP:
Try changing this if you are
experiencing black or glitchy screens
APP_SETTINGS.CLEAR_PIPEWIRE_TOKENS_HELP: Prompt for screen selection on next start
APP_SETTINGS.DELETE_ALL_CONFIGS_HELP: Remove all configuration files from conf.d
APP_SETTINGS.DOUBLE_CURSOR_FIX_HELP: Enable this if you see 2 cursors
APP_SETTINGS.HANDSFREE_POINTER_HELP:
Input to use when motion
controllers are unavailable.
Left pinch is grab, right is click.
APP_SETTINGS.KEYBOARD_MIDDLE_CLICK_HELP:
Modifier to use when typing
with purple laser
APP_SETTINGS.LEFT_HANDED_MOUSE_HELP: Use this if mouse buttons are swapped

OPTION.AUTO_HELP:
ScreenCopy GPU if supported,
otherwise PipeWire GPU.
OPTION.PIPEWIRE_HELP:
Fast GPU capture,
standard on all desktops.
OPTION.PW_FALLBACK_HELP:
Slow method with high CPU usage.
Try in case PipeWire GPU doesn't work
OPTION.SCREENCOPY_GPU_HELP:
Fast, no screen share popups.
Works on: Hyprland, Niri, River, Sway
OPTION.SCREENCOPY_HELP:
Slow, no screen share popups.
Works on: Hyprland, Niri, River, Sway

APP_SETTINGS.RESTART_SOFTWARE_HELP: Apply settings that require a restart
APP_SETTINGS.SCREEN_RENDER_DOWN_HELP: Helps with aliasing on high-res screens
APP_SETTINGS.SPACE_DRAG_UNLOCKED: Allow space drag on all axes
APP_SETTINGS.SPACE_ROTATE_UNLOCKED: Allow space rotate on all axes
APP_SETTINGS.UPRIGHT_SCREEN_FIX_HELP: Fixes upright screens on some desktops
APP_SETTINGS.USE_PASSTHROUGH_HELP: Allow passthrough if the XR runtime supports it
APP_SETTINGS.USE_SKYBOX_HELP: Show a skybox if there's no scene app or passthrough
APP_SETTINGS.XWAYLAND_BY_DEFAULT: Run apps in Compatibility mode by default

AUDIO.NO_VR_MICROPHONE_SWITCH_MANUALLY: No VR microphone found. Switch it manually.
AUDIO.NO_VR_SPEAKERS_FOUND_SWITCH_MANUALLY: No VR speakers found. Switch them manually.
